page.title: 02RAVARNETTE MISSION
page.content:
{Ravarnette Mission}
We are very proud to have a Mission Hall in Ravarnette. They have three meetings per week. On Saturday night there is a meeting for children. On Sunday night there is a meeting for everyone. On Wednesday there is a Prayer Union. Auntie Iris plays the piano.
The late Mr. Cowan used to conduct the meeting. My Granny, Auntie Carol and Mrs. Crpssey and a few ladies in the village go to the Prayer Meeting.
The aim of the meeting is to present the Christian message to everyone. by Selina Hull
